summary: This module provides a comprehensive test suite for the rolling window functionality in Dask DataFrames, covering groupby rolling, time-based windows, aggregation methods, covariance calculations, overlap mapping, engine selection, partition sizing, and error handling to validate behavior against pandas.
business_intent: To guarantee the correctness, robustness, and performance of rolling computations in Dask, enabling reliable time‑series and windowed analytics for large‑scale data processing applications.
